message: I suggest a 60-40 split in my favor. This is a fair offer considering we both want to avoid inflation eating into our gains.

Hi Alice, I propose an equal 50-50 split. This is fair for both of us, and we should agree quickly since inflation is reducing the value for me by 5% each round, and may be affecting you similarly. This way we both walk away with a good deal without risking further devaluation.
